# leftBumper

**Type Property**

The name of the additional left shoulder button.

## Declaration

```swift
static let leftBumper: GCButtonElementName
```

## Getting extended gamepad shoulder button names

- **leftShoulder**: The name of the left shoulder button.
- **rightShoulder**: The name of the right shoulder button.
- **rightBumper**: The name of the additional right shoulder button.
